data.text: @Caerdydd65 @RugbyPhilBB Ah yes! I note the product of this particular genius venture is reviewed on Untapped as "Poor condition, vinegary. Much like the WRU, really."
@paulsregor @RugbyPhilBB Hah!  You forgot  Chief Brewing Dogsbody

@Caerdydd65 @RugbyPhilBB Expect he's perfectly happy in his current main job of Commercial Property Tycoon & Master of the "Marquee Project Development" Universe. "CEO of a major national sports body" is just a side hussle.
@RugbyPhilBB Finally, a WRU job within Steve Phillips’ capabilities…. https://t.co/nrcImdPI0d
@Noahgryff13 @RugbyPhilBB I took Jnr 2 to play Ponty at tag once -  it was a crappy little pitch with a portacabin and insufficient parking in Trefforest. Never took Jnr 1 there

@DonTheMask @Chugger @RugbyPhilBB Easy to spot though aren’t they, normally advertise it upfront in fairness to them with “ponty” in the handle. You know straight away at that point you’re in for a laugh
@Chugger @RugbyPhilBB Same here. He's part of the Loon Squad with Geraint Lodger, Owen Insane and Wyn the Quim.
@RugbyPhilBB Oh I hardly think we are talking Edward Jenkins here.
@30pointsto03Rob He has a long history of gross own goal errors, so if it is a wind up then it is as self harming as is Robins' behaviour.
